com.scene7.qa.benchmark
Class Reports

java.lang.Object
  com.scene7.qa.benchmark.Reports

public class Reports
extends java.lang.Object

A class to encapsulate each report's detail, such as description, SQL statement and chart type.

Version:
Jul 25, 2012
Author:
hewong

 class Reports.ReportNode
          An inner class to store each report's metadata, including name, description and SQL statement.

Field Detail

reportsMap

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Reports.ReportNode> reportsMap
Data structure that stores names of all reports.
Each report maps to a ReportNode which has report description, sql statement and etc.
Example: name -> report details 
 { 'today_yesterday' : 
                {       // ReportNode
                        'description' : ..., 
                        'sql' : ...,
                        'chartType' : ...
                }
 }

Method Detail

addReport

public Reports.ReportNode addReport(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String desc,
                                    java.lang.String sql,
                                    java.lang.String chartType)
Method to add report object to data structure.

Parameters:
name - report name
desc - report description
sql - sql statement to generate this report
chartType - chart type used for this report (Google Visualization API)
Returns:
ReportNode object

getReport

public Reports.ReportNode getReport(java.lang.String name)
Getter for report object by report name.

Parameters:
name - report name used in data structure (see QueryHandler)
Returns:
ReportNode

Populate report objects from predefined queries.
see QueryHandler.class.

Parameters:
q - QueryHandler object
